name: 3rd World Conference on Business, Management, and Economics
content: Description 3rd World Conference on Business, Management, and Economics (WORLDBME) 2025 Dates: May 23-25, 2025 Location: Munich, Germany Venue: Steigenberger Hotel München, Berliner Strabe 85, Munich, Germany Conference Overview The 3rd World Conference on Business, Management, and Economics (WORLDBME) 2025 offers a dynamic platform to explore the latest breakthroughs and emerging trends in business, management, and finance. Hosted at the renowned Steigenberger Hotel in Munich, this event brings together academics, researchers, and industry experts from around the world to exchange knowledge, present research, and explore forward-thinking solutions to current challenges. Why Attend WORLDBME 2025? Engage in Innovative Discussions: Hear from leading global experts who will share insights on the latest trends, pressing issues, and opportunities in business, management, and finance. Gain the knowledge and skills needed to excel in your field. Showcase Your Research: Present your work to an international audience of professionals and researchers. Receive valuable feedback that will strengthen your research and broaden its reach. Diverse Presentation Options: Choose the format that works best for you, whether it’s delivering an oral presentation, displaying a research poster, or presenting virtually. Expand Your Global Network: Connect with fellow academics, professionals, and researchers from across the globe. WORLDBME 2025 offers an excellent environment for establishing new collaborations and partnerships. Experience Munich: Enhance your conference experience with a complimentary guided tour of Munich, a city rich in culture, history, and innovation. Network with peers while exploring iconic landmarks in a relaxed setting. Publication Opportunities: Get your research published in the conference proceedings or submit it to indexed journals such as SCOPUS and Web of Science, ensuring greater visibility and impact for your work. Important Dates Abstract Submission Deadline: May 2, 2025 Notification of Acceptance: Within 7-14 days of submission Early Bird Registration Deadline: November 26, 2024 Early Registration Deadline: February 12, 2025 Late Registration Deadline: May 12, 2025 Conference Dates: May 23-25, 2025
